name: NSTableHeaderCell
desc: An object that a table header view uses to draw the content of the column headers.

items.name: func drawSortIndicator(withFrame: NSRect, in: NSView, ascending: Bool, priority: Int)
items.desc: Draws a sorting indicator given a cell frame contained inside a view.

items.name: func sortIndicatorRect(forBounds: NSRect) -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the location to display the sorting indicator given theRect.
